Hi, Simon-

Suomi Hand will be available from FontShop in a day or two.

Hi Tomi

How much will it be selling for? Thanks

I don't want to take any business away from Tomi (I have licensed several of your fonts, and I admire your work), but you can also look for other casual printing styles in [Part 11 of the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20141108080218/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/Script11Pg1.html) to get ideas for other similar styles.

- Mike Yanega

Hi, Mike-

You are right that there are plenty of casual hand-drawn style fonts, and they are – in most parts – very good. But with Suomi Hand it is hand-writing in a single style, with all points in all glyphs hand drawn into place to keep the scale. I used no auto-tracing, and I never scanned anything, just had samples of the text next to me while drawing the glyphs.
